Class Options<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.ui.cli.Options<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - 

    public final class Options<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    receives a question and some options of the group of options

      • addOptions

        public Options<T> addOptions(java.util.List<T> values,
                             java.util.function.Function<T,java.lang.String> optionToStringFunction)
        adds an option for each element of the list, where as value it uses the same object contained in the list. To generate the option string it uses a function that receives the object
